name: es-module-shims
description: Shims for the latest ES module features

scripts.build: rollup ./src/es-module-shims.js -f iife -o dist/es-module-shims.js --banner "/* ES Module Shims 0.1.0 */"
scripts.min: cd dist && terser es-module-shims.js -c passes=2 -m --source-map -o es-module-shims.min.js
scripts.footprint: npm run build && npm run min && cat dist/es-module-shims.min.js | gzip -9f | wc -c

author: Guy Bedford
